Articles.Content:
EKO MOD THREAD

COMING SOON: WALK-ABLE IVA (NEED 3D MODELERS)

WALK-ABLE IVA (WIVA) will allow kerbals to walk around (or float) while in certain modules in IVA view.

Development Status: NEED MODELS to complete mod.

TERRAFORMING: Will allow kerbals to terraform a planet, in other words, make it livable.

Development Status: 40% Complete give or take.

Edited June 27, 2014 by 11Bravo

OMG! Yes! You have my support! 10 trillion percent!

I've been wanting walkable IVA for a while now!
Any consept art or hint how your doing it ?
Models? as in?
I am absolutely intressed in this. If you can explain to us, me or maybe others can make some models for you.

I am absolutely intressed in this. If you can explain to us, me or maybe others can make some models for you.

Well, I can explain what I need which are models of the internal IVAs. I cant really give away what Im doing at least till Im done. Someone with more time than me will steal my idea (not that I care) but I have worked so hard on this already I would hate for my time not sleeping to be wasted. I am working on a way to build another building called the IAB to build custom interiors, I will need parts like that as well
Interresting, but give more info please. What do you have so far? Whats the plan?

Interresting, but give more info please. What do you have so far? Whats the plan?

I have everything done except any modules for iva and the iva interior.

I might as well explain it. What happens when you IVA with this mod will be like entering the atmosphere of a really small planet. Instead of mountains and water etc. It will be a model of the interior. I cannot really explain it without writing a novel on it lol.

I wouldn't mind reading a novel on this.

Can you show us a picture or video of it in action?
Ill try to get one up today after work
This is really exciting. I can make some props and interiors maybe.

So you've used the freedom of planetary EVA with some models on top to fake freedom in IVA? Genius.

How far do you think you can take this? If it's possible, could you look into setting up standards for hatches between parts and connecting multiple interior models? In other words, if two parts connect on one node and both of those parts have the same "hatch type" at the node, the hatch doors are removed from both interiors and you can travel between them. It would basically be the full 3D version of the Connected Living Space API. It doesn't seem like it would be that hard, but I have no idea what you have set up. If you managed to do this though, that would make this mod the king of all mods.

It seems you aren't in the forums long If this works and I dearly hope so, you will go from zero to hero in the modding community Good Luck and I hope you can convince a talented modeler to help you (Porkjet please xD)
I can do some 3D Modelling if needed. Send me a message if you need anything.

There was a mod about a year ago that had code in it to allow you to animate the stock Kerbals.

I can't remember the name, but would that help with any of the interior animations?

Well, as far as doing specific jobs like standing next to a machine doing science experiments etc.

Maybe someone else can reminder the mod.

There was a mod about a year ago that had code in it to allow you to animate the stock Kerbals.

I can't remember the name, but would that help with any of the interior animations?

Well, as far as doing specific jobs like standing next to a machine doing science experiments etc.

Maybe someone else can reminder the mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56952-WIP-Animated-EVA-ScienceRack

I presume you mean these?:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50916-WIP-Animated-Workshop

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56952-WIP-Animated-EVA-ScienceRack

Yes that looks like it, unfortunately it doesn't look like he ever released anything.

Thanks though.
hmm i could do some minor modeling which is all i am good for at the moment
its a shame this isnt being worked anymore

2 hours ago, guesswho2778 said:

its a shame this isnt being worked anymore

have you had a look at this:
what no i havent thank you
